bio: Gemble is the most skilled medic in all of the Infinite Inferno. Unfortunately, it can't leave the pond on the 3rd floor.

soultimate.name: Pool of Paradise
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Heals allies at a rate of 15% every 2 seconds for 30 seconds.
soultimate.description: All nearby allies slowly recover HP.

skill.effect: Positive Inspirit effects last 20% longer on allies.
skill.name: Extra Mile

name: Gemble
